tasks.label: Sandbox: Set OpenAI Secret
tasks.command: npx ampx sandbox secret set OPENAI_API_KEY

tasks.label: Sandbox: Reset (Delete & Restart)
tasks.command: npx ampx sandbox delete -y && ./scripts/set-secrets.sh && npx ampx sandbox --outputs-out-dir frontend/public

tasks.label: Lambda: Invoke RSS Poller
tasks.command: FUNC=$(aws lambda list-functions --query "Functions[?contains(FunctionName, 'rsspoll')].FunctionName" --output text) && echo "Invoking $FUNC" && aws lambda invoke --function-name $FUNC --payload '{}' /tmp/rss-poll-output.json && cat /tmp/rss-poll-output.json

tasks.label: Lambda: Invoke AI Processor
tasks.command: FUNC=$(aws lambda list-functions --query "Functions[?contains(FunctionName, 'aiprocessor')].FunctionName" --output text) && echo "Invoking $FUNC" && aws lambda invoke --function-name $FUNC --payload '{}' /tmp/ai-processor-output.json && cat /tmp/ai-processor-output.json

tasks.label: Lambda: Invoke Content Enricher
tasks.command: FUNC=$(aws lambda list-functions --query "Functions[?contains(FunctionName, 'contentenricher')].FunctionName" --output text) && echo "Invoking $FUNC" && aws lambda invoke --function-name $FUNC --payload '{}' /tmp/enricher-output.json && cat /tmp/enricher-output.json

tasks.label: Lambda: Invoke All (RSS -> Enricher -> AI)
tasks.command:
echo '=== RSS Poller ===' && FUNC=$(aws lambda list-functions --query "Functions[?contains(FunctionName, 'rsspoll')].FunctionName" --output text) && aws lambda invoke --function-name $FUNC --payload '{}' /tmp/rss-output.json && cat /tmp/rss-output.json && echo '
=== Content Enricher ===' && FUNC=$(aws lambda list-functions --query "Functions[?contains(FunctionName, 'contentenricher')].FunctionName" --output text) && aws lambda invoke --function-name $FUNC --payload '{}' /tmp/enricher-output.json && cat /tmp/enricher-output.json && echo '
=== AI Processor ===' && FUNC=$(aws lambda list-functions --query "Functions[?contains(FunctionName, 'aiprocessor')].FunctionName" --output text) && aws lambda invoke --function-name $FUNC --payload '{}' /tmp/ai-output.json && cat /tmp/ai-output.json

tasks.label: Data: Cleanup Now
tasks.command: FUNC=$(aws lambda list-functions --query "Functions[?contains(FunctionName, 'datacleanup')].FunctionName" --output text) && echo "Invoking $FUNC" && aws lambda invoke --function-name $FUNC --payload '{"action": "full"}' --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out /tmp/cleanup-output.json && cat /tmp/cleanup-output.json
